name: Skyhawk Holdings, INC.
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence-based platform designed to predict the risk of disruption associated with each flight. The company's platform uses machine learning to predict disruptions ahead of time and automatically rebook a traveler's flight for free, enabling passengers to add flexibility and security to their flights, save time and complete their journey.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence-based platform designed to predict the risk of disruption associated with each flight.
